greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Runs-resistance of the binary expansion of n without the first digit.
comment: For the operation of taking the sequence of run-lengths of a finite sequence, runs-resistance is defined to be the number of applications required to reach a singleton.
example: Minimal representatives with each image are:
xref: Keeping the first digit gives A318928.
Compositions counted by runs-resistance are A329744.
Binary words counted by runs-resistance are A319411 and A329767.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Nov 25 2019
